column1: Uchi////Caveat: I love nigiri (fish on rice)/sashimi/oysters so those are what I eat in Boston
column4: and California. Read: primarily only in those places
column5: where the fish is fresh. (Raw seafood is
column7: the one "food group" I'm picky about and will appear to be a snob for. Please excuse me.) Although I've had decent salmon pieces at Osaka
